note: Blind vocalist, skier and accessibility enthusiast studying voice at Eastman School of Music. Advocate for Music Braille availability and digital notation accessibility. Proud Maine islander. Inactive personal account; views expressed were my own at time of posting, not affiliated with any institution, organization, employer, etc, and may no longer represent me or my current beliefs (people change).
